processingCommand.script:
cd ${HOME}/eod_scripts/maintenance
source /appl/murex/config/$MX_ENVIRONMENT.env.conf
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_UDF_DEAL_REP

echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_PARTIES_REP

echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_UDF_CNTRP_REP
echo | sqlplus /@$DB_SID_DM_WALLET @gather_statistics_for_one_table.sql $DB_SCHEMA_DM BD_UDF_PF_REP
